newsitem.title: USA: Regis, Supercuts holders approve merger.
newsitem.headline: Regis, Supercuts holders approve merger.

text.p: Regis Corp and Supercuts Inc said Wednesday that shareholders of their companies approved the merger of Supercuts with a wholly owned Regis susidiary.
Regis and Supercuts agreed to merge in July in a stock-for-stock transaction.
Under the merger agreement, the transaction will become effective on October 25.
Regis operates 2,005 hair salons while Supercuts owns, operates and franchises over 1,150 salons.
